name: CountrySide Guard
description:
Greeting from Thailand.

I'm just an Indy man who created this game. Who knows? This game is supposed to be about a guard who were hire by the government at a very high prices.

   His job is to keep the border line's gate safe from being hacked. Will he die to that dangerous mission?

1.0.2 Balance Update

  •  Fixed Bug when terrorist disappear while being chase.
  •  Decrease Engineer speed (From 20 > 5)
